p: Despite the deviating habitat situations among the four spatially separated blocks (Figs S7, S8), which may lead to different response patterns (Scherrer & Körner, 2011), changes in species occurrence, cover and composition were generally consistent, especially across the blocks in the ecotone (Figs 2, 3, 4). The observed deviations from the common trends, however, can contribute to a better understanding of possible causes and mechanisms behind the observed changes.
